auth_error_1.message: It looks like something failed while we were trying to log you in, please try again by refreshing this page.
auth_error_1.description: First paragraph from authentication error placeholder

auth_error_2.message: If the problem persists you can leave a bug report on the
auth_error_2.description: second paragraph from authentication error placeholder

auth_error_3.message: and we will try to fix it as soon as possible.
auth_error_3.description: Third paragraph from authentication error placeholder

extension_description.message: Highlight content and save it for your.

placeholder_title.message: Looks like there is nothing here
placeholder_title.description: Placeholder title when there are no quotes saved

placeholder_subtitle.message: Save some content to start your journey
placeholder_subtitle.description: Placeholder subtitle when there are no quotes saved

delete_warning_1.message: You are about to delete the

delete_warning_2.message: quote, are you sure you want to continue performing this action? After deleted, it is impossible to access this quote again.

delete_error.message: Something happened, the quote could not be deleted
delete_error.description: Error message when deleting a quote

delete_success.description: Success message when a quote is deleted

delete_many_warning_2.message: quotes, are you sure you want to continue performing this action? After complete, it is impossible to access this data again.

delete_many_error.description: Error message when some quotes failed to be deleted

delete_many_success.description: Success message when quotes are deleted

select_error.description: Error message when no quote is selected and a batch action is triggered

update_error.message: Something happened, could not update the quote's title
update_error.description: Error message when updating a quote

story_menu_title.description: Side menu option to access user stories

add_to_stories.description: Menu item text to add a quote as a storie

create_story_title.description: Title for the create story dialog

story_create_success.description: Success message when story is created

story_create_error.message: The story couldn't be created, please try again
story_create_error.description: Error message when creating a story

about_us_1.message: Hello, my name is Gerardo García and i’m a software developer. I had the idea of QuoteMark a while ago because i sometimes forget about important details i read on the Internet, that situation sometimes led to silly mistakes and inefficient solutions that made me lose time.

about_us_2.message: For me, this is a personal project to make me solve that little problem and learn a few things in the process. I also documented the development lifecycle on my YouTube channel to make it a bit more fun, so if you know a bit of spanish you can watch the videos i made on the subject.

about_us_3.message: I have plans to continue developing this little side projects and documenting them on YouTube, so if you are interested in this kind of topics, you can follow me on social media to be informed of what i’m doing.

about_us_4.message: I really hope this tool is overall useful for you, and if you catch any bug or have any idea on a new feature you can DM me through social media and i will respond as soon as possible. On the other hand if you, for any reason, want to support this little work that i do with a donation i’ll be more than grateful for your help.
